HotelElement.Name: Oscar On Main Resort Gold Coast

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Oscar on Main Resort in Main Beach, you'll be by the sea and convenient to Mariner's Cove Marina and Sea World. This 4.5-star apartment is within close proximity of Marina Mirage Shopping Centre and Australia Fair Shopping Centre.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 35 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring kitchens with full-sized refrigerators/freezers and stovetops. Rooms have private furnished balconies. Flat-screen televisions with digital programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include phones, as well as microwaves and washers/dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreational opportunities offered, including an outdoor pool, an indoor pool, and a sauna. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and tour/ticket assistance. If you're planning a day at a nearby theme park, you can hop on the shuttle (surcharge).

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, luggage storage, and an elevator (lift). A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and free self parking is available onsite.
